DOC.brief_summary: Paclitaxel covered metal biliary stent extents their patency rate comparing to the Common Covered Metallic Biliary Stent.
DOC.brief_title: Patency and Safety of the Drug Eluting Covered Biliary Stent Comparing to the Common Covered Biliary Stent
DOC.detailed_description: Paclitaxel covered metal biliary stent(Mira-Cover Biliary Stent) extents their patency rate comparing to the Common Covered Metallic Biliary Stent(Niti-S Biliary Stent.
DOC.criteria: Patient who is inoperable and/or unresectable cases of pancreatic cancer and/or biliary cancer with mid or distal CBD invasion Among patient of a.,Patient who previously had surgical biliary drainage of plastic stent have eligibility Patient who have life expectancy under 3 months Patient who have severe metastasis of Liver or whole body Patient who previously had surgical biliary drainage
